TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Information extends System.Object

summary.span: 模块包含用于返回、测试或验证信息的过程。

span.span: The module contains the procedures used to return, test for, or verify information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模块支持 Visual Basic 语言关键字和运行时库成员, 这些关键字提供错误信息、验证数据、确定数组边界以及检索数据类型和颜色信息。This module supports the Visual Basic language keywords and run-time library members that provide error information, validate data, determine array bounds, and retrieve data type and color information. ## Examples 下面的示例使用`VbTypeName`函数返回多个变量的数据类型名称。The following example uses the `VbTypeName` function to return data type names for several variables. ```vb Dim sysDateName As String = "System.DateTime" Dim sysShortName As String = "Int16" Dim sysBadName As String = "Nonsense" Dim testVbName As String testVbName = VbTypeName(sysDateName) ' Returns "Date". testVbName = VbTypeName(sysShortName) ' Returns "Short". testVbName = VbTypeName(sysBadName) ' Returns Nothing. ```

related.span: Visual Basic 运行时库成员

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static int32 Erl() cil managed

summary.span: 返回指示上一条执行语句的行号的整数。

span.span: Returns an integer indicating the line number of the last executed statement.

returns.span: 返回指示上一条执行语句的行号的整数。

span.span: Returns an integer indicating the line number of the last executed statement.

returns.span: 只读。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 Visual Basic 没有遇到任何行号, 则返回0。If Visual Basic encounters no line numbers, it returns 0. ## Examples 此示例使用`Erl`属性指示行号。This example uses the `Erl` property to indicate the line number. [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static class Microsoft.VisualBasic.ErrObject Err() cil managed

summary.span: 包含运行时错误的相关信息。

returns.span: 包含运行时错误的相关信息。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Err`对象的属性由错误 Visual Basic、对象或程序员的生成器设置。The properties of the `Err` object are set by the generator of an error - Visual Basic, an object, or the programmer. 发生运行时错误时, 将使用唯一标识错误的`Err`信息填充对象的属性, 并使用可用于处理错误的信息。When a run-time error occurs, the properties of the `Err` object are filled with information that uniquely identifies the error and that you can use to handle the error. 若要在代码中生成运行时错误, 请使用`Raise`方法。To generate a run-time error in your code, use the `Raise` method. `Exit Function` `Exit Sub` `Resume Next` `Exit Property`对象的属性在错误处理例程中的、、或语句后重置为零或零长度字符串 ("")。 `Err`The `Err` object's properties are reset to zero or zero-length strings ("") after an `Exit Sub`, `Exit Function`, `Exit Property`, or `Resume Next` statement within an error-handling routine. 在`Resume`错误处理例程之外使用语句的任何形式都不会重置该`Err`对象的属性。Using any form of the `Resume` statement outside of an error-handling routine will not reset the `Err` object's properties. 您可以使用`Clear`方法显式重置`Err`。You can use the `Clear` method to explicitly reset `Err`. 使用方法而不是`Error`语句来生成系统错误和类模块的运行时错误。 `Raise`Use the `Raise` method rather than the `Error` statement to generate run-time errors for system errors and class modules. 您决定是否在其他代码中`Raise`使用方法取决于您要返回的信息的丰富程度。Your decision about whether to use the `Raise` method in other code depends on the richness of the information you want to return. `Err`对象是具有全局范围的内部对象。The `Err` object is an intrinsic object with global scope. 因此, 您无需在代码中创建它的实例。Therefore, you do not need to create an instance of it in your code. ## Examples 此示例使用构造错误消息对话框`Err`中的对象的属性。This example uses the properties of the `Err` object in constructing an error-message dialog box. 请注意, 如果您首先`Clear`使用方法, 当您使用`Raise`方法生成 Visual Basic 错误时, Visual Basic 的默认值将成为该`Err`对象的属性。Notice that if you use the `Clear` method first, when you generate a Visual Basic error with the `Raise` method, Visual Basic's default values become the properties of the `Err` object. [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static bool IsArray(object VarName) cil managed
Public Function IsArray (VarName As Object) As Boolean

summary.span: 返回一个 值，指示变量是否指向数组。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether a variable points to an array.

returns.span: 返回一个 值，指示变量是否指向数组。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether a variable points to an array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IsArray`如果`True`变量指向数组, 则返回; 否则`False`返回。`IsArray` returns `True` if the variable points to an array; otherwise, it returns `False`. `IsArray`对于可能包含数组的对象特别有用。`IsArray` is especially useful with objects that might contain arrays. ## Examples 此示例使用`IsArray`函数检查几个变量是否引用数组。This example uses the `IsArray` function to check if several variables refer to an array. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#34](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#34)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static bool IsDate(object Expression) cil managed
Public Function IsDate (Expression As Object) As Boolean

summary.span: 返回一个 值，该值指示表达式是否表示一个有效的 值。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression represents a valid value.

returns.span: 返回一个 值，该值指示表达式是否表示一个有效的 值。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression represents a valid value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IsDate`如果`True` 是数据类型或可转换为它, `False`则返回; 否则返回。 `Expression``IsDate` returns `True` if `Expression` is of the data type or can be converted to it; otherwise, it returns `False`. 数据类型包含日期值和时间值。The data type holds both a date value and a time value. `IsDate`如果`True`表示`Expression`有效的日期、有效时间或有效的日期和时间, 则返回。`IsDate` returns `True` if `Expression` represents a valid date, a valid time, or a valid date and time. ## Examples 下面的示例使用`IsDate`函数来确定几个变量是否表示有效的值。The following example uses the `IsDate` function to determine if several variables represent valid values. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#35)] 在前面的示例中`IsDate` , `True`将返回前四个调用`False`和最后一个调用的。In the preceding example, `IsDate` returns `True` for the first four calls and `False` for the last call.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static bool IsDBNull(object Expression) cil managed
Public Function IsDBNull (Expression As Object) As Boolean

summary.span: 返回一个 值，指示表达式的计算结果是否为 类。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression evaluates to the class.

returns.span: 返回一个 值，指示表达式的计算结果是否为 类。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression evaluates to the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IsDBNull`如果`True`的数据类型的`Expression`计算结果为类型, `IsDBNull` `False`则返回; 否则返回。`IsDBNull` returns `True` if the data type of `Expression` evaluates to the type; otherwise, `IsDBNull` returns `False`. 值指示`Object`表示缺少数据或不存在数据。The value indicates that the `Object` represents missing or nonexistent data. `DBNull`与不相同`Nothing`, 这表示尚未初始化变量。`DBNull` is not the same as `Nothing`, which indicates that a variable has not yet been initialized. `DBNull`也不同于零长度字符串 (`""`), 这有时称为空字符串。`DBNull` is also not the same as a zero-length string (`""`), which is sometimes referred to as a null string. ## Examples 此示例使用`IsDBNull`函数来确定变量的计算结果是否为`DBNull`。This example uses the `IsDBNull` function to determine if a variable evaluates to `DBNull`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#36](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#36)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static bool IsError(object Expression) cil managed
Public Function IsError (Expression As Object) As Boolean

summary.span: 返回一个 值，指示表达式是否是异常类型。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression is an exception type.

returns.span: 返回一个 值，指示表达式是否是异常类型。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression is an exception type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IsError`如果`True`表达式表示从命名空间中的类派生的变量,则返回。`Object` `IsError` returns `True` if the expression represents an `Object` variable that derives from the class in the namespace. 派生自的`Try...Catch...Finally`异常可以通过语句来捕获。An exception that derives from can be caught with the `Try...Catch...Finally` statements. ## Examples 下面的示例使用`IsError`函数检查表达式是否表示系统异常。The following example uses the `IsError` function to check if an expression represents a system exception. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#37](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#37)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static bool IsNothing(object Expression) cil managed
Public Function IsNothing (Expression As Object) As Boolean

summary.span: 返回一个 值，指示表达式是否未被指派对象。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression has no object assigned to it.

returns.span: 返回一个 值，指示表达式是否未被指派对象。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression has no object assigned to it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IsNothing`如果`True`表达式表示当前未分配对象的对象变量, 则返回; 否则`False`返回。`IsNothing` returns `True` if the expression represents an object variable that currently has no object assigned to it; otherwise, it returns `False`. `IsNothing`用于处理引用类型。`IsNothing` is intended to work on reference types. 如果分配`Nothing`给值类型, 该值类型不能包含[任何](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/nothing.md)值, 并且会恢复为其默认值。A value type cannot hold a value of [Nothing](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/nothing.md) and reverts to its default value if you assign `Nothing` to it. 如果在中`Expression`提供了值类型, `IsNothing`则始终`False`返回。If you supply a value type in `Expression`, `IsNothing` always returns `False`. ## Examples 下面的示例使用`IsNothing`函数来确定对象变量是否与任何对象实例相关联。The following example uses the `IsNothing` function to determine if an object variable is associated with any object instance. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#38](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#38)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static bool IsNumeric(object Expression) cil managed
Public Function IsNumeric (Expression As Object) As Boolean

summary.span: 返回一个 值，指示表达式的计算结果是否为数字。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression can be evaluated as a number.

returns.span: 返回一个 值，指示表达式的计算结果是否为数字。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression can be evaluated as a number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IsNumeric`如果`True`的`Boolean`数据类型`Double`为`Single`、 `Byte` 、、`Long`、 、`Short`、、、、 ,`UInteger`则返回。 `SByte` `Decimal` `Expression` `Integer`、 `ULong`或。`UShort``IsNumeric` returns `True` if the data type of `Expression` is `Boolean`, `Byte`, `Decimal`, `Double`, `Integer`, `Long`, `SByte`, `Short`, `Single`, `UInteger`, `ULong`, or `UShort`. 如果`True` `String`是、或`Object`可以成功转换为数字的, 则此方法也会返回。 `Char` `Expression`It also returns `True` if `Expression` is a `Char`, `String`, or `Object` that can be successfully converted to a number. `Expression`可以包含非数字字符。`Expression` can contain non-numeric characters. `IsNumeric``True` 如果`Expression`是包含有效的十六进制或八进制数字的字符串, 则返回。`IsNumeric` returns `True` if `Expression` is a string that contains a valid hexadecimal or octal number. `IsNumeric`如果包含`True`以`Expression` + 或-字符开头或包含逗号的有效数值表达式, 则也返回。`IsNumeric` also returns `True` if `Expression` contains a valid numeric expression that begins with a + or - character or contains commas. `IsNumeric`如果`False` `Date`的数据类型为, 则返回。 `Expression``IsNumeric` returns `False` if `Expression` is of data type `Date`. 如果`False` `String`是、或`Object`无法成功转换为数字的, 则返回。 `Char` `Expression`It returns `False` if `Expression` is a `Char`, `String`, or `Object` that cannot be successfully converted to a number. ## Examples 下面的示例使用`IsNumeric`函数来确定变量的内容是否可以作为数字进行计算。The following example uses the `IsNumeric` function to determine if the contents of a variable can be evaluated as a number. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#39)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static bool IsReference(object Expression) cil managed
Public Function IsReference (Expression As Object) As Boolean

summary.span: 返回一个 值，指示表达式是否为引用类型。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression evaluates to a reference type.

returns.span: 返回一个 值，指示表达式是否为引用类型。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression evaluates to a reference type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IsReference`如果`True` `String` `False`表示引用类型 (如类实例、类型或任何类型的数组), 则返回; 否则返回。 `Expression``IsReference` returns `True` if `Expression` represents a reference type, such as a class instance, a `String` type, or an array of any type; otherwise, it returns `False`. 引用类型包含指向存储在内存中其他位置的数据的指针。A reference type contains a pointer to data stored elsewhere in memory. 值类型包含其自身的数据。A value type contains its own data. ## Examples 此示例使用`IsReference`函数检查几个变量是否引用引用类型。This example uses the `IsReference` function to check if several variables refer to reference types. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#40)] 在前面的示例中, `IsReference`返回`True`的前三个调用。In the preceding example, the first three calls to `IsReference` return `True`. 最后一个调用返回`False`, 因为`Integer`是值类型, 而不是引用类型。The last call returns `False`, because `Integer` is a value type, not a reference type.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int LBound (Array Array, int Rank = 1);

static member LBound : Array * int -> int

param.name: Array
param.span: 希望在其中找到维度的最小可能下标的数组。

span.span: The array in which you want to find the lowest possible subscript of a dimension.

param.name: Rank
param.span: 将返回其最小可用下标的维度。

span.span: The dimension for which the lowest possible subscript is to be returned.

param.span: 对第一维使用 1，对第二维使用 2，依此类推。

span.span: Use 1 for the first dimension, 2 for the second, and so on.

summary.span: 返回数组的指示维度的最小可用下标。

span.span: Returns the lowest available subscript for the indicated dimension of an array.

returns.span: 指定维度的下标可以包含的最小值。

span.span: The lowest value the subscript for the specified dimension can contain.

returns.span: 只要 已初始化，即使其中没有元素（例如，它是一个零长度字符串）， 也始终返回 0。

span.span: always returns 0 as long as has been initialized, even if it has no elements, for example if it is a zero-length string.

returns.span: 如果 为 ，则 将引发 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于数组下标从 0 开始，因此每一维度最小可用的下标总是为 0。Since array subscripts start at 0, the lowest available subscript for every dimension is always 0. 对于具有以下维度的数组, `LBound`返回下表中的值:For an array with the following dimensions, `LBound` returns the values in the following table: ```vb Dim a(100, 5, 4) As Byte ``` |调用 LBoundCall to LBound|返回值Return value| |--------------------|------------------| |`LBound(a, 1)`|00| |`LBound(a, 2)`|00| |`LBound(a, 3)`|00| ## Examples 下面的示例使用`LBound`函数来确定数组的指示维度的最小可用下标。The following example uses the `LBound` function to determine the lowest available subscript for the indicated dimension of an array. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#41](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#41)]

exception.span: 小于 1，或 大于 的级别。

span.span: less than 1, or is greater than the rank of .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static int32 QBColor(int32 Color) cil managed
Public Function QBColor (Color As Integer) As Integer

span.span: A whole number in the range 0-15.

summary.span: 返回一个 值，表示与指定的颜色编号对应的 RGB 颜色代码。

span.span: Returns an value representing the RGB color code corresponding to the specified color number.

returns.span: 返回一个 值，表示与指定的颜色编号对应的 RGB 颜色代码。

span.span: Returns an value representing the RGB color code corresponding to the specified color number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从最小有效字节开始, 返回值指定红色、绿色和蓝色值, 这些值用于在 Visual Basic 语言使用的 RGB 系统中设置相应的颜色。Starting with the least-significant byte, the returned value specifies the red, green, and blue values used to set the appropriate color in the RGB system used by the Visual Basic language. `Color`参数包含这些设置。The `Color` argument has these settings. |数字Number|颜色Color|数字Number|颜色Color| |------------|-----------|------------|-----------| |00|黑色Black|88|灰色Gray| |11|蓝色Blue|99|浅蓝色Light blue| |22|绿色Green|1010|浅绿色Light green| |33|蓝Cyan|1111|浅青色Light cyan| |44|红色Red|1212|浅红色Light red| |55|洋红色Magenta|1313|浅洋红色Light magenta| |66|黄色Yellow|1414|浅黄色Light yellow| |77|白色White|1515|亮白色Bright white| ## Examples 此示例使用`QBColor`函数更改为`colorInteger`指示的颜色。This example uses the `QBColor` function to change to the color indicated by `colorInteger`. `QBColor`接受0到15之间的整数值。`QBColor` accepts integer values between 0 and 15. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#29](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#29)]

exception.span: 不在 0 到 15（均含）范围之内。

span.span: is outside of range 0 to 15, inclusive.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int RGB (int Red, int Green, int Blue);
.method public static int32 RGB(int32 Red, int32 Green, int32 Blue) cil managed
Public Function RGB (Red As Integer, Green As Integer, Blue As Integer) As Integer
public: static int RGB(int Red, int Green, int Blue);
static member RGB : int * int * int -> int

param.name: Red
param.span: 0–255 范围内（均含）的 值，表示颜色中红色分量的强度。

span.span: in the range 0-255, inclusive, that represents the intensity of the red component of the color.

param.name: Green
param.span: 0–255 范围内（均含）的 值，表示颜色中绿色分量的强度。

span.span: in the range 0-255, inclusive, that represents the intensity of the green component of the color.

param.name: Blue
param.span: 0–255 范围内（均含）的 值，表示颜色中蓝色分量的强度。

span.span: in the range 0-255, inclusive, that represents the intensity of the blue component of the color.

summary.span: 返回一个 值，表示由一组红色、绿色和蓝色分量形成的 RGB 颜色值。

span.span: Returns an value representing an RGB color value from a set of red, green and blue color components.

returns.span: 返回一个 值，表示由一组红色、绿色和蓝色分量形成的 RGB 颜色值。

span.span: Returns an value representing an RGB color value from a set of red, green and blue color components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接受颜色规范的应用程序方法和属性希望该规范为表示 RGB 颜色值的数字。Application methods and properties that accept a color specification expect that specification to be a number representing an RGB color value. RGB 颜色值指定红色、绿色和蓝色的相对亮度, 以使特定颜色显示。An RGB color value specifies the relative intensity of red, green, and blue to cause a specific color to be displayed. 如果的任何自变量`RGB`的值大于 255, 则使用255。If the value for any argument to `RGB` is greater than 255, 255 is used. 下表列出了一些标准颜色以及它们包括的红色、绿色和蓝色值。The following table lists some standard colors and the red, green, and blue values they include. |颜色Color|红色值Red value|绿色值Green value|蓝色值Blue value| |-----------|---------------|-----------------|----------------| |黑色Black|00|00|00| |蓝色Blue|00|00|255255| |绿色Green|00|255255|00| |蓝Cyan|00|255255|255255| |红色Red|255255|00|00| |洋红色Magenta|255255|00|255255| |黄色Yellow|255255|255255|00| |白色White|255255|255255|255255| ## Examples 此示例演示如何`RGB`使用函数返回`RGB`表示颜色值的整数。This example shows how the `RGB` function is used to return a whole number representing an `RGB` color value. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#18)]

exception.span: 、，或 不在 0 到 255（含 0 和 255）范围之内。

span.span: , , or is outside of range 0 to 255, inclusive.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static string SystemTypeName(string VbName) cil managed
Public Function SystemTypeName (VbName As String) As String

param.name: VbName
param.span: 一个包含 Visual Basic 类型名称的 变量。

span.span: A variable containing a Visual Basic type name.

summary.span: 返回一个 值，它包含变量的系统数据类型名称。

span.span: Returns a value containing the system data type name of a variable.

returns.span: 返回一个 值，它包含变量的系统数据类型名称。

span.span: Returns a value containing the system data type name of a variable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `SystemTypeName`返回与 Visual Basic 类型名称对应的完全限定的公共语言运行时 (CLR) 类型名称。`SystemTypeName` returns the fully qualified common language runtime (CLR) type name corresponding to the Visual Basic type name. 例如, 如果包含`VbName` "Date", `SystemTypeName`则返回 "system.string"。For example, if `VbName` contains "Date", `SystemTypeName` returns "System.DateTime". 如果`SystemTypeName`无法识别的`VbName`值, 则返回`Nothing` (而不是字符串 "Nothing")。If `SystemTypeName` does not recognize the value of `VbName`, it returns `Nothing` (not the string "Nothing"). ## Examples 下面的示例使用`SystemTypeName`函数返回多个变量的数据类型名称。The following example uses the `SystemTypeName` function to return data type names for several variables. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#49](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#49)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static string TypeName(object VarName) cil managed
Public Function TypeName (VarName As Object) As String

param.name: VarName
param.span: 如果 为 ，则可以传递除结构之外的任何数据类型的变量。

span.span: If is , you can pass a variable of any data type except a structure.

summary.span: 返回一个 值，它包含变量的数据类型信息。

span.span: Returns a value containing data-type information about a variable.

returns.span: 返回一个 值，它包含变量的数据类型信息。

span.span: Returns a value containing data-type information about a variable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示`String`了`TypeName`为的不同内容`VarName`返回的值。The following table shows the `String` values returned by `TypeName` for different contents of `VarName`. |`VarName`目录`VarName` contents|返回的字符串String returned| |------------------------|---------------------| |16位`True`或`False`值类型16-bit `True` or `False` value type|变量"Boolean"| |8位二进制值类型8-bit binary value type|位"Byte"| |16位字符值类型16-bit character value type|Char"Char"| |64位日期和时间值类型64-bit date and time value type|日期"Date"| |指示缺少数据或不存在数据的引用类型Reference type indicating missing or nonexistent data|"DBNull""DBNull"| |128位定点数值类型128-bit fixed-point numeric value type|式"Decimal"| |64位浮点数值类型64-bit floating-point numeric value type|仔细"Double"| |32位整数值类型32-bit integer value type|整数"Integer"| |指向非专用化对象的引用类型Reference type pointing to an unspecialized object|对象"Object"| |指向从类*objectclass*创建的专用对象的引用类型Reference type pointing to a specialized object created from class *objectclass*|"*objectclass*""*objectclass*"| |64位整数值类型64-bit integer value type|漫长"Long"| |当前未分配任何对象的引用类型Reference type with no object currently assigned to it|没"Nothing"| |8位带符号整数值类型8-bit signed integer value type|SByte"SByte"| |16位整数值类型16-bit integer value type|短暂"Short"| |32位浮点数值类型32-bit floating-point numeric value type|单个"Single"| |指向16位字符的字符串的引用类型Reference type pointing to a string of 16-bit characters|类似"String"| |32位无符号整数值类型32-bit unsigned integer value type|UInteger"UInteger"| |64位无符号整数值类型64-bit unsigned integer value type|ULong"ULong"| |16位无符号整数值类型16-bit unsigned integer value type|UShort"UShort"| 如果`VarName`是数组, 则返回的字符串可以是上表中追加了空括号的任何一个字符串。If `VarName` is an array, the returned string can be any one of the strings in the preceding table with empty parentheses appended. 例如, 如果指向`VarName`整数数组, `TypeName`则返回 "Integer ()"。For example, if `VarName` points to an array of integers, `TypeName` returns "Integer()". 当`TypeName`返回引用类型的名称 (如类) 时, 它只返回名称本身, 而不返回限定名称。When `TypeName` returns the name of a reference type such as a class, it returns only the name itself, not the qualified name. 例如, 如果`VarName`指向类的对象, `TypeName`将返回 "PaperSource"。For example, if `VarName` points to an object of class , `TypeName` returns "PaperSource". 请注意, 如果将变量声明为特定的类类型, 但没有为其赋值, `TypeName`则返回 "Nothing"。Note that if the variable is declared to be of a certain class type but does not have an object assigned to it, `TypeName` returns "Nothing". ## Examples 下面的示例使用`TypeName`函数返回有关多个变量的数据类型信息。The following example uses the `TypeName` function to return data type information about several variables. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#52](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#52)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static int UBound (Array Array, int Rank = 1);
.method public static int32 UBound(class System.Array Array, int32 Rank) cil managed
static member UBound : Array * int -> int

param.name: Array
param.span: 要在其中查找维度的最大可能下标的数组。

span.span: The array in which you want to find the highest possible subscript of a dimension.

param.name: Rank
param.span: 将返回其最大可用下标的维度。

span.span: The dimension for which the highest possible subscript is to be returned.

param.span: 对第一维使用 1，对第二维使用 2，依此类推。

span.span: Use 1 for the first dimension, 2 for the second, and so on.

summary.span: 返回数组的指示维度的最大可用下标。

span.span: Returns the highest available subscript for the indicated dimension of an array.

returns.span: 指定维度的下标可以包含的最大值。

span.span: The highest value the subscript for the specified dimension can contain.

returns.span: 如果 只有一个元素，则 返回 0。

span.span: If has only one element, returns 0.

returns.span: 如果 没有元素，例如它是一个零长度字符串，则 返回 -1。

span.span: If has no elements, for example if it is a zero-length string, returns -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于数组下标从0开始, 因此维度的长度比该维度的最大可用下标大1。Since array subscripts start at 0, the length of a dimension is greater by one than the highest available subscript for that dimension. 对于具有以下维度的数组, `UBound`返回下表中的值:For an array with the following dimensions, `UBound` returns the values in the following table: ```vb Dim a(100, 5, 4) As Byte ``` |调用 UBoundCall to UBound|返回值Return value| |--------------------|------------------| |`UBound(a, 1)`|100100| |`UBound(a, 2)`|55| |`UBound(a, 3)`|44| 您可以使用`UBound`来确定数组中的元素总数, 但必须调整它返回的值, 以考虑下标从0开始这一事实。You can use `UBound` to determine the total number of elements in an array, but you must adjust the value it returns to account for the fact that the subscripts start at 0. 下面的示例计算前面的示例中数组`a`的总大小:The following example calculates the total size of the array `a` in the preceding example: ```vb Dim total As Integer total = (UBound(A, 1) + 1) * (UBound(A, 2) + 1) * (UBound(A, 3) + 1) ``` 为计算得出`total`的值为 3030, 即 101 \* 6 \* 5。The value calculated for `total` is 3030, which is 101 \* 6 \* 5. ## Examples 下面的示例使用`UBound`函数来确定数组的指示维度的最大可用下标。The following example uses the `UBound` function to determine the highest available subscript for the indicated dimension of an array. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#53](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#53)]

exception.span: 小于 1，或 大于 的级别。

span.span: is less than 1, or is greater than the rank of .

Public Function VarType (VarName As Object) As VariantType

param.name: VarName
param.span: 如果 为 ，则可以传递除结构之外的任何数据类型的变量。

span.span: If is , you can pass a variable of any data type except a structure.

summary.span: 返回一个 值，它包含变量的数据类型分类。

span.span: Returns an value containing the data type classification of a variable.

returns.span: 返回一个 值，它包含变量的数据类型分类。

span.span: Returns an value containing the data type classification of a variable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回`VarType`的整数值是的成员。The integer value returned by `VarType` is a member of the . 下表显示了`VarType`针对的特殊`VarName`情况返回的值。The following table shows the values returned by `VarType` for special cases of `VarName`. |表示的数据类型`VarName`Data type represented by `VarName`|返回的值`VarType`Value returned by `VarType`| |----------------------------------------|---------------------------------| |[NothingNothing](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/nothing.md)|`VariantType.Object`| ||`VariantType.Null`| |枚举Enumeration|基础数据类型 (`SByte`、 `Byte` `Short` 、`UShort`、、 `Integer` 、、`ULong`或) `UInteger` `Long`Underlying data type (`SByte`, `Byte`, `Short`, `UShort`, `Integer`, `UInteger`, `Long`, or `ULong`)| |数组Array|数组元素类型和的按位 OR`VariantType.Array`Bitwise OR of array element type and `VariantType.Array`| |数组数组Array of arrays|And 的`VariantType.Object`按位 or`VariantType.Array`Bitwise OR of `VariantType.Object` and `VariantType.Array`| |结构 ()Structure ()|`VariantType.UserDefinedType`| ||`VariantType.Error`| |未知Unknown|`VariantType.Object`| ## Examples 下面的示例使用`VarType`函数返回有关多个变量的数据类型分类信息。The following example uses the `VarType` function to return data type classification information about several variables. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#55](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#55)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static string VbTypeName(string UrtName) cil managed
Public Function VbTypeName (UrtName As String) As String

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: UrtName
param.span: 变量，其中包含公共语言运行时所使用的类型名称。

span.span: variable containing a type name used by the common language runtime.

summary.span: 返回一个 值，它包含变量的 Visual Basic 数据类型名称。

span.span: Returns a value containing the Visual Basic data type name of a variable.

returns.span: 返回一个 值，它包含变量的 Visual Basic 数据类型名称。

span.span: Returns a value containing the Visual Basic data type name of a variable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `VbTypeName`返回与公共语言运行时类型名称对应的 Visual Basic 类型名称。`VbTypeName` returns the Visual Basic type name corresponding to the common language runtime type name. 例如, 如果包含`UrtName` "Int32" 或 "system.string", `VbTypeName`则返回 "Integer"。For example, if `UrtName` contains "Int32" or "System.Int32", `VbTypeName` returns "Integer". 如果`VbTypeName`无法识别的`UrtName`值, 则返回`Nothing` (而不是字符串 "Nothing")。If `VbTypeName` does not recognize the value of `UrtName`, it returns `Nothing` (not the string "Nothing"). `UrtName`可以从各种源中获取类型名称, 例如从类的数组中的属性获取。The type name in `UrtName` can be obtained from various sources, for example from the property in the array of the class. ## Examples 下面的示例使用`VbTypeName`函数返回多个变量的数据类型名称。The following example uses the `VbTypeName` function to return data type names for several variables. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#56](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#56)]
